dialog.clear: Are you sure you want to clear this composition?
dialog.overwrite: Are you sure you want to overwrite this composition?
dialog.download: Downloading a recording requires you to playback your composition.

popup.accidentalstip: Select Accidentals for each of the 7 steps of the scale (notes used are represented on the piano octave above, press the keys to hear sound).
popup.nosaved: You don't have any compositions saved yet
popup.name: Enter a name
popup.title: Title
popup.author: Author
popup.sharetext: Share Chant on your favorite social network:
popup.link: Copy the link above to manually share your composition.
popup.sharetip: If you want to share your composition on Twitter or by manually copying link use link shortener like
popup.howtextone: Chant uses English musical notation with letters A to G and parses provided text in search of those letter if you use 'C' key setting and no accidentals. If you change Key or add accidentals - Chant would still use the same letters but the notes they represent would change.
popup.howtexttwo: Capital letters are played one octave above and first letter since the last word break is played one octave below.
popup.howtextthree: Using this knowledge you can try to create controlled compositions or you could just paste some text to get seemingly random patterns. Text with repetitions should sound best.
popup.creditstexttwo: , a front end web developer and a member of electronic duo
popup.creditstextfive: Feel free to drop us a word at
popup.code: All about the code? You're welcome to have a look at Chant source code on

howto.play:
Play/Stop, Loop and Share your composition using these buttons.
Hover over any element for a short tooltip
howto.settings:
Tap for composition settings, such as Tempo, Key and Accedentals

Key determines 7 notes scale used in composition, Accidentals alter those notes to make them higher (sharp) or lower (flat).
howto.settingsDesktop:
Change composition settings, such as Tempo, Key and Accedentals

Key determines 7 notes scale used in composition, Accidentals alter those notes to make them higher (sharp) or lower (flat).
howto.instrument: Select instrument for a track and change its settings, such as Volume, Panning, Octave Shift and more.
howto.more: More instrument settings are behind this button.
howto.menu: Use main menu to save your composition for later, download mp3 and perform other composition related actions.

error.title: Error
error.storage: Your local storage limit has exceeded, try removing old compositions.

ui.howto: Click this icon to get instructions

chant.placeholder: Place any English text here and hit Play. Tip: select a character to start playback from it.
